sqlMap.statement: SELECT CTT.CLICK_TECH_TRNSF_TO_PK ,CTT.TO_INVTY_LOC_CD ,CTT.TECH_TRNSF_RQST_TS ,CTT.MDSE_CD ,CTT.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,CTT.SHIP_QTY ,CTT.FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,CTT.TECH_PROC_STS_DESC_TXT ,CTT.TECH_TRNSF_RTRN_STS_TXT ,CTT.SER_NUM ,CTT.CLICK_KEY_TXT ,TLC.CTRY_CD ,TLC.POST_CD FROM CLICK_TECH_TRNSF_TO CTT ,TECH_LOC TLC WHERE CTT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CTT.PROC_STS_CD IN (#inCompleted#, #error#) AND CTT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CTT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TLC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CTT.FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD = TLC.TECH_LOC_CD(+) AND CTT.EZCANCELFLAG = TLC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) ORDER BY CTT.EZINTIME ASC
